tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Mihir is undoubtedly the finest dentist. I started my ortho treatment 6 months back and it has been a great experience since then. 
I had procrastinated the treatment for years but glad to have finally done it under his supervision. He is really assuring in his advices and it gives a good comfort to be under his responsible hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Mihir guided me in his utmost best capacity with my teeth issues. I went to him for the visible gaps in my teeth which I needed an aid for and also solution for a decaying tooth. 

He is patient, precise and thorough professional. I received a timely, uninterrupted and well- planned treatment.

A friendly warm atmosphere makes it a plus.

Thank You doctor. Dr. Mihir is my highly recommended and trusted dentist.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I will always rate 5 star to Dr. Mihir and Dr. Tanushree as they are simply fantastic in their work. Even in this pandemic situation, they ensure to take care of every single hygiene. They make patient comfortable and give the right advise for all treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr.Mihir since 2016 whenever I or my family members have any dental problems. He makes us feel so comfortable while the treatment is going on that I am no longer afraid of going to a dentist. Even my kids r no longer scared of going to a dentist as Dr.Mihir is so calm and has great patience while treating the kids. I have recommended him to all my relatives and friends. He and his wife are excellent at their job.
reply_text: Thank you soo much for your kind words.. It feels nice and grateful to have entire family trusting us with their dental health..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was a very pleasant and satisfactory experience as always.  Dr. Parekh takes lots of care in solving every problem, explains the course of treatment and treats with utmost perfection till the patient is satisfied...that too with a smile.
He is very polite n friendly...which makes me at ease.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.. A happy and satisfied patient is all that we always strive for..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

reply_text: Thank you soo much for you kind words Aamer.. Glad I could be of help to you..

review: My experience with Dr Miri is one I won't forget. His explanation and assurance of steps he needs to take,  it made the whole progesss feel like a walk in the park. Shannon
